repo_description: The api of the RetroWave platform, a video games social network

schemas.name: schema.gql
schemas.content:
# -----------------------------------------------
# !!! THIS FILE WAS GENERATED BY TYPE-GRAPHQL !!!
# !!!   DO NOT MODIFY THIS FILE BY YOURSELF   !!!
# -----------------------------------------------

type Color {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  hexCode: String!
}

type Comment {
  id: ID!
  text: String!
  createdAt: DateTime!
  gamer: Gamer!
  likes: [Like!]!
  numbersOfLikes: Int!
}

type Company {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

type Connectivity {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  type: ConnectivityType!
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]!
}

# All availables connectivities
enum ConnectivityType {
  BLUETOOTH
  WIFI
  ETHERNET
  RADIOWAVE
}

type Console {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  shortName: String!
  codeName: String
  description: String!
  developers: [Developer!]!
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]!
  types: [ConsoleType!]!
  models: [ConsoleModel!]!
  generation: ConsoleGeneration!
  releaseDates: [ReleaseDate!]!
  retailAvailabilities: [RetailAvailability!]!
  discontinuedDates: [DiscontinuedDate!]!
  unitsSolds: [UnitsSold!]!
  controllers: [Controller!]!
  operatringSystems: [OperatingSystem!]!
  storages: [Storage!]!
  cpus: [CPU!]!
  gpus: [GPU!]!
  displays: [Display!]!
  soundSystems: [SoundSystem!]!
  connectivities: [Connectivity!]!
  gameMedias: [GameMedia!]!
  dimensions: Dimensions!
  colors: [Color!]!
  predecessor: Console
  successor: Console
  games: [Game!]!
  likes: [Like!]!
  ratings: [Rating!]!
}

type ConsoleGeneration {
  id: ID!
  rank: Int!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

type ConsoleModel {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

type ConsoleType {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

type Controller {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  developers: [Developer!]!
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]!
  types: [ControllerType!]!
  generation: ConsoleGeneration!
  dimensions: Dimensions!
  releaseDates: [ReleaseDate!]!
  colors: [Color!]!
  predecessor: Controller
  successor: Controller
  likes: [Like!]!
  ratings: [Rating!]!
}

type ControllerType {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

# All availables countries
enum Country {
  WW
  FR
  JP
  GB
  US
}

type CountryPairDate {
  id: ID!
  country: Country!
  date: DateTime!
}

type CPU {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  codeName: String
  description: String!
  numberOfCore: Int!
  clockrate: Float!
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]!
}

# The javascript `Date` as string. Type represents date and time as the ISO Date string.
scalar DateTime

type Developer {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

type Dimensions {
  id: ID!
  width: Float!
  height: Float!
  depth: Float!
}

type DiscontinuedDate {
  id: ID!
  country: Country!
  date: DateTime!
}

type Display {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

type Game {
  id: ID!
  title: String!
  shortTitle: String
  description: String!
  platforms: [Console!]!
  developers: [Developer!]!
  publishers: [Publisher!]!
  releaseDates: [ReleaseDate!]!
  retailAvailabilities: [RetailAvailability!]!
  discontinuedDates: [DiscontinuedDate!]!
  unitsSolds: [UnitsSold!]!
  predecessor: Game
  successor: Game
  likes: [Like!]!
  ratings: [Rating!]!
}

type GameMedia {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]!
}

type Gamer {
  id: ID!
  fullName: String!
  gamertag: String!
  description: String
}

type GPU {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  codeName: String
  description: String!
  numberOfCore: Int!
  clockrate: Float!
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]!
}

type Like {
  id: ID!
  createdAt: DateTime!
  gamer: Gamer!
}

type Manufacturer {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

type OperatingSystem {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  developers: [Developer!]!
}

type Publisher {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
}

type Query {
  companies: [Company!]!
  company(id: String!): Company
  developers: [Developer!]!
  developer(id: String!): Developer
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]!
  manufacturer(id: String!): Manufacturer
  publishers: [Publisher!]!
  publisher(id: String!): Publisher
  consoleTypes: [ConsoleType!]!
  consoleType(id: String!): ConsoleType
  consoleModels: [ConsoleModel!]!
  consoleModel(id: String!): ConsoleModel
  consoleGenerations: [ConsoleGeneration!]!
  consoleGeneration(id: String!): ConsoleGeneration
  releaseDates: [ReleaseDate!]!
  releaseDate(id: String!): ReleaseDate
  retailAvailabilities: [RetailAvailability!]!
  retailAvailability(id: String!): RetailAvailability
  discontinuedDates: [DiscontinuedDate!]!
  discontinuedDate(id: String!): DiscontinuedDate
  unitsSolds: [UnitsSold!]!
  unitsSold(id: String!): UnitsSold
  controllerTypes: [ControllerType!]!
  controllerType(id: String!): ControllerType
  controllers: [Controller!]!
  controller(id: String!): Controller
  operatingSystems: [OperatingSystem!]!
  operatingSystem(id: String!): OperatingSystem
  storages: [Storage!]!
  storage(id: String!): Storage
  cpus: [CPU!]!
  cpu(id: String!): CPU
  gpus: [GPU!]!
  gpu(id: String!): GPU
  displays: [Display!]!
  display(id: String!): Display
  soundSystems: [SoundSystem!]!
  soundSystem(id: String!): SoundSystem
  connectivities: [Connectivity!]!
  connectivity(id: String!): Connectivity
  gameMedias: [GameMedia!]!
  gameMedia(id: String!): GameMedia
  allDimensions: [Dimensions!]!
  dimensions(id: String!): Dimensions
  colors: [Color!]!
  color(id: String!): Color
  consoles: [Console!]!
  console(id: String!): Console
  games: [Game!]!
  game(id: String!): Game
  likes: [Like!]!
  like(id: String!): Like
  comments: [Comment!]!
  comment(id: String!): Comment
  ratings: [Rating!]!
  rating(id: String!): Rating
  gamers: [Gamer!]!
  gamer(id: String!): Gamer
}

type Rating {
  id: ID!
  value: Float!
  createdAt: DateTime!
  gamer: Gamer!
}

type ReleaseDate {
  id: ID!
  country: Country!
  date: DateTime!
}

type RetailAvailability {
  id: ID!
  country: Country!
  startYear: Int!
  endYear: Int!
}

type SoundSystem {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]!
}

type Storage {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  type: StorageType!
  availablesCapacities: [Int!]!
  developers: [Developer!]
  manufacturers: [Manufacturer!]
}

# All availables storage types
enum StorageType {
  InternalHDD
  InternalSSD
  RemovableMemoryCard
  RemovableMicroSDCard
}

type UnitsSold {
  id: ID!
  country: Country!
  amount: Int!
}
